text: Blaž Kavčič was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Yasutaka Uchiyama won the title after defeating Wu Di 6–4, 7–6(7–4) in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Shanghai Challenger - Singles 2019 Singles
title: 2019 Shanghai Challenger – Singles
